pullrequest.title: New example using custom Protobuf messages

content.raw:
Looks great, and it definitely helped me make custom messages work. 

One thing that would improve this example though would be to cover how to make importing existing ignition msgs work. This is almost certainly required for all projects--redefining all the primitive types provided by ignition msgs seems silly. My question is, is there a CMake variable that gives the location of the igntion msgs? Right now I'm using `set(PROTOBUF_IMPORT_DIRS /home/peter/Projects/ign/ign-msgs)`, which isn't ideal.
content.html:
Looks great, and it definitely helped me make custom messages work.

One thing that would improve this example though would be to cover how to make importing existing ignition msgs work. This is almost certainly required for all projects--redefining all the primitive types provided by ignition msgs seems silly. My question is, is there a CMake variable that gives the location of the igntion msgs? Right now I'm using set(PROTOBUF_IMPORT_DIRS /home/peter/Projects/ign/ign-msgs), which isn't ideal.
